Since 1900, the Peru has contributed to the growth of the "Olympic Movement".Olympics.org, "Factsheet: The Olympic Movement"; retrieved 2012-7-28. The International Olympic Committee's official abbreviation for Peru is PER. ==History== The Peru National Olympic Committee was formed in 1924. It was recognized by the International Olympic Committee in 1936.Olympic.org, Peru; retrieved 2012-7-28. Peru's team first competed at the 1900 Summer Olympics in Paris. Since 1936, the nation has been in all but one Summer Olympic Games.
